article: Long time ago, there was a woman with a surpring spell .If someone was under the spell, he or she would get perfect  _  .One day, the woman put the spell on her toad ,and then the toad got beautiful teeth. They could help him  _  all kinds of food. He could  _  start speaking. The toad was  _  with the spell.He started to eat lots of chocolate.The woman found this and said to him,"  Look after  your teeth and brush them often.Don't eat so much chocolate..."  _  the toad didn't listen to her.He believed his teeth were very good and he didn't have to brush them ofen.And he liked chocolate very much,so he didn't want to eat  _  . One day,one of the toad's teeth got bad.Day by day,all the teeth in his  _  got bad.The toad decided to start looking after them,but it was too  _  .And when he  _  his last tooth,he couldn't speak any more. The toad thought if the woman put the spell on him again,he would brush them every day.But that never happened again.
